question: Who clinched the menâ€™s title at the 2019 Italian Open Tennis tournament?
explanation: In Tennis, defending champion Rafael Nadal of Spain has clinched the Italian Open 2019 title after beating Novak Djokovic 6-0, 4-6, 6-1 in the final in Rome on May 19. This is Nadal\'s ninth Italian Open title. It is the 81st title of Nadal\'s career. Nadal also broke a tie with Djokovic by claiming a record 34th ATP Masters 1000 crown. Whereas, in Women\'s single Czech\'s Karolina Pliskova registered two straight-set victory against Britain\'s Johanna Konta 6-3, 6-4 to claim the Italian Open title.
